autoplay.description: Start describing a video as soon as one is detected on the page and is playing.

waitTime.description: The amount of time (in seconds) the video will remain paused for while reading a description. Defaults to 3 seconds.

cooldown.description: The time (in seconds) that the adapter waits after providing a description before generating the next description. Defaults to 5 seconds.

overlayEnabled.description: Enables or disables the video overlay. If set to false, you will still be able to use a screen reader to interact with the descriptions.
